channel.title: vcftools on Shannon J. O'Leary
channel.description: Recent content in vcftools on Shannon J. O'Leary

item.title: Bioinformatic processing of RAD data sets
item.description: Approaches to limit, detect and remove artefacts from RADseq data sets introduced during library prep and bioinformatic processing to create robust data sets consisting of orthologous, freely-recombining loci.
